SupporterMilitaryConnectionDescriptor.ShortDescription: Student is a dependent of a (full-time) member of the military
SupporterMilitaryConnectionDescriptor.Description: Student is a dependent of a member of the Active Duty Forces (full-time) Army, Navy, Air Force, Space Force, Marine Corps, or Coast Guard or a member on full-time National Guard duty

SupporterMilitaryConnectionDescriptor.ShortDescription: Student is a dependent of a member of reserve forces or national guard
SupporterMilitaryConnectionDescriptor.Description: Student is a dependent of a member of the National Guard (not full-time) or the Reserve Forces Army, Navy, Air Force, Space Force, Marine Corps or Coast Guard

SupporterMilitaryConnectionDescriptor.ShortDescription: Student is a dependent of a discharged military personnel or a retiree
SupporterMilitaryConnectionDescriptor.Description: Student is a dependent of a person who has served in the US military and become discharged or released or got retired after completing required amount of years of military services

SupporterMilitaryConnectionDescriptor.ShortDescription: Student is a dependent of a civil servant to the DoD
SupporterMilitaryConnectionDescriptor.Description: Student is a dependent of a person who is employed by the Department of Defense as a civil servant

SupporterMilitaryConnectionDescriptor.ShortDescription: People who the student is a dependent of is/are not military connected
SupporterMilitaryConnectionDescriptor.Description: Contact does not have a connection with military or department of defense as an employee or retiree
It is unknown whether or not the student is a dependent of a person who is military-connected
